entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Alban's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Snow mixed with rain late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 80 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending in the evening then cloudy. Flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries. Windy. High minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls. Windy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
